FuncDef: This command assigns a node SID index or label value to the prefix representing the primary address of an IPv4 network interface oftype loopback. Only a single node SID can be assigned to an interface. The secondary address of an IPv4 interface cannot be assigned a node SID index and does not inherit the SID of the primary IPv4 address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index value. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies the label value. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Clears the node SID flag. ParamDefault: Default- no clear-n-flag
